outputs.output_descr: This would be undertaken through Support to Response Coordination, Post Recovery Needs Assessment and formulating appropriate  Recovery Response Plan and Strategies.

This programme seeks to assist the local population's financial recovery and psycho-social outlook by providing a temporary source of cash income in exchange for work related to debris clean-up, restoration of livelihoods activities and improving preparedness for future cyclones.  Equipment and materials for resumption of key livelihoods activities will be provided in parallel.

project_descr: The overall objective of the project is to support and strengthen the capacity of the Government of Tonga to implement the early recovery process effectively.
